ranked_sentences.sentence: The Astros crushed the Phillies, 10-0, to avoid being swept at Citizens Bank Park.
It was the worst home shutout loss for the Phillies since August 10, 2017.
Houston Astros matched their season high with 18 hits.
Verlander struck out three, walked one, allowed four runs, and gave up seven hits in five innings.
Yordan Alvarez has 28 homers this year and is slashing .352/.448/.656 with nine homers and 19 RBIs since the All-Star break.
Phillies LHP José Alvarado was expected to return this season after he was placed a day earlier on the restricted list for a personal matter.
At 41 years, 189 days, Justin Verlander is the oldest active pitcher in the major leagues.
